subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Chargers’ Darren Sproles is the N.F.L.’s answer to the Red Sox’ Dustin Pedroia: a player recognized for his shortness who made a big impact in the playoffs.
snippet: The Chargers’ Darren Sproles is the N.F.L.’s answer to the Red Sox’ Dustin Pedroia: a player recognized for his shortness who made a big impact in the playoffs.
